CHAT.comment: Time is 18:32. MOT and Chi are difficult to hear most of the time; they whisper to one another and there is a tv set playing in the background , which makes it difficult to hear their voices. Video does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio. MOT and Chi work well together; although there is not always much talk , they seem to communicate silently. On several occasions Mot silently models the way in which magnets work and Chi imitates. There is a fair amount of talk about the magnets and how they work. Mot directs most of the play.

u.a: talks about filming the activity
talks about setting up the video camera
drops paper clip onto center of silver circle on base; it sticks straight up
whispered
video starts here
black magnet base is on the table; Mot and Chi are seated next to one another; the silver circle is on the black base and has magnets stuck to it in a circle
picks up paper clips and drops them onto center of silver circle; some stick straight up
picks up silver man and drops it onto silver circle; it stands straight up in between the paper clips
picks up another silver man and drops it onto base; it knocks over the first man and the paper clips
moves hand to pick up silver man Mot has dropped on base
picks up silver man and drops it onto the black base
picks up another silver man from table
picks up a silver man from table and holds it out to Mot
holds man up and drops it onto black base; it falls
drops silver man onto black base
picks up silver stick and puts it on the head of one of the silver men who is standing on the black base
points at silver stick that is on top of the silver man
picks up another silver stick from table
balances the second silver stick on hand of silver man; then picks up a third stick and balances that one on the other hand; picks up washers and slides them onto the sticks
picks up washers and slides them onto silver sticks; the stick on the silver man's right hand falls
picks up blue plastic teddy bear and sticks it on the top of a silver stick that is still balenced on the silver man's hand

picks up horseshoe magnet and moves it over the base

puts plastic turtle on black base
puts plastic teddy bear on turtle's back

attempts to place penny on top of a silver stick on the black base; it falls

taps penny with yellow wand

holds horseshoe magnet over the blue and white checked magnet; there is a slight pull
holds yellow wand over the blue and white checked magnet; it sticks
whispered
holds yellow wand over objects on black base; some of them stick to the wand
puts a nut on a pile of other nuts on the black base , and then moves horseshoe magnet toward the yellow wand that Chi is holding

sticks silver stick to a silver ball on the black base then pulls the silver stick away
pulls silver ball off black base and puts it on table

puts silver ball back on black base; holds silver stick to it
pulls hand away from silver stick

builds a tower on the black base out of nuts , washers , and silver balls
places a silver man at the top of the tower

begins to replace fallen objects

places silver ball on tower and then continues building
